W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: Though you didn't find your heart, you still feel your time in this world was well-spent. That said, you're ready to depart Delta Base.

W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.text: Perhaps the time has come to enlist their help with finding your heart.

W10_GIMK_DIVA_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_DIVA_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.text: Is this the unidentified being on the lower levels that you've heard about? Perhaps it will lead to your heart.

W10_GIMK_DIVA_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_DIVA_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.text: Is this the unidentified being on the lower levels that you've heard about? Perhaps it will lead to your heart.

W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You find a world that reminds you of yourself on the other side of the door.

A00_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
A00_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Albion's National Extradimensional Exploratory Task Force needs to become stronger.

A00_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
A00_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_DETAIL.text: You feel as though you've improved your battle prowess slightly.

A00_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
A00_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_DETAIL.text: You feel as though your training is just about over.
